attributes.action: Curb the amount of overseas aid this country gives and redirect money to Nhs.
attributes.additional_details: I don't think anymore information about this is needed.  If we want to take care of the world we should start by taking care of ourselves.  Unless our government is silently pushing us towards a totally privatised health service then there is no excuse for the current state of affairs. We have enough money to have an unequalled national health service. Let's put the money where it belongs.
attributes.background: Clearly our nhs is in crisis.  It is alleged that we don't have the money to sustain it. Clearly this is not the case. We need to give less away to foreign causes as spend more at home,  after all,  if we can't look after our own people how can we be expected to look after anyone else.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/177384
